website_summaries.verdict: This compact and powerful microwave is a great option for small households or those with limited counter space.
pros: The 1000 watts of cooking power is more than enough for a microwave of this size
The biggest benefit of a compact microwave is the additional counter space
Has many cool features, such as a six-wheel turntable
cons: Many of the microwave's  functions are built into a keypad that is only accessed when the door is open, which may be an adjustment for some users

customer_reviews.title: Check out the exterior and interior measurements.  Some plates won't fit!
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with this microwave. It was the smallest model I found, yet still delivers 1100 watts of power. The front is plain; very nice looking. It is easy to clean; the top and sides look like stainless, but shows no fingerprints. It works great as a countertop because it is compact, and has a lovely plain front. No big logos. Be sure and understand the interior size of this oven, because some cups or plates may not fit. But this was exactly what I needed. Nice looking, strong power and compact.
customer_reviews.author: myopinion

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE the function ....and the size is terrific...
customer_reviews.text: Even if I had a huge amount of space I would still buy this again. perfect size and the controls are awesome.... can thaw something perfectly without cooking part of it.... love it
customer_reviews.author: Robbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the controls and look
customer_reviews.text: Love the controls and look. Hit the plus and it adds 10 seconds at a time or slide your your finger right or left to increase or decrease time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great device(when it works)
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool unit. It s sleak and perfect if you want a small microwave. Unfortunately, it does not last long. I purchased it 12/2018 and it broke in less than a year. LG promised a refund but I have not seen it yet in spite or multiple calls. This is surprising because I have other LG products, washing machines, multiple air conditioners, etc all going strong. Oh well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solutionj for a microwave with a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: We needed to get rid of a previous small microwave because it was beginning to leak radiation. Finding one that would fit the small place for it in our cabinetry was a primary goal. This microwave filled the bill and works perfectly for us and has for about two years now and it is still working perfectly. We just ordered another one of the same model for a condo we just purchased, again driven by the small size and the reliable product we previously bought.
customer_reviews.author: "tim-lfp"

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: My built in micro wave broke and is not worth fixing. So the alternative was to buy a spare, until I find one that I like that is on sale. That way I am not forced into pay a large amount of money right away. Once I replace the one over the store I will put the spare away until I need it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Kulak

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This is THE WORST product ever!!!!! I have had this for 1.5 months. Will NOT heat anything. AMAZON refuses to refund- COMPANY sent from REFUSING TO REFUND. POINTING THE FINGER AT AMAZON. RIDICULOUS CUSTOMER SERVICE FROM BOTH PLACES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Kozub

customer_reviews.title: Recommended. Cooks delicious food.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave primarily because of the size. It takes less space than microwaves I saw in kitchenware stores. I like the design and color. About the functionality, it heats the dinner plate so quickly without burning. It has 30 seconds option. It also cooks raw food. You can throw veggies and beef in a glass container with cap and put it in for 20 mins. I tried and it cooked delicious. About the lights it's bright enough to see the movement inside. Thanks for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Deniz Sa.

customer_reviews.title: Sparking and dangerous in 13 months
customer_reviews.text: A year and a month after purchase, unit began to spark inside magnetron area. Did not use metal, and unit is clean. Warranty of one year no good, and although the magnetron is guaranteed for 10 years, forced to find a repair place. In addition, the musical tunes that cannot be turned off are very annoying. A simple beep would be sufficient. Perhaps i got what i paid for, but tired of poorly made appliances. Not buying another LG microwave again.
customer_reviews.author: daze on the road

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This item was nice at first loved it! Then less than 6 mo after having it it quit heating out of nowhere. And good luck getting LG to help you out. 3 reps said they were handling my issue and apparently all 3 lied because when I checked for a status update they kept saying there were no notes. And they NOT ONCE reached out to me. POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE ON LGS PART! STILL AWAITING A REFUND.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton turvey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks fast and evenly. Looks great and the sounds it makes aren't a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chime, heats food well! I Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave so far, a lot of people have complained about the chime it makes when food is done, and I would have to disagree, I like the sound it makes. I would much rather hear a cool chime than a loud alarm of a normal microwave sound... (honestly!) I love that It doesn't have numbers and I can slide my finger to adjust the time quickly. This microwave takes up less space than my last one, has more power, looks nicer and fits my plates just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, the plates fit well. Love the music it plays when the timer goes off! Love the wattage, not wimpy. Didn't know if we would like the number pad - there isn't one! But, the slide bar is so easy to use. It advances to higher numbers quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Barandiaran

customer_reviews.title: LG Neo
customer_reviews.text: Seller did a good job and Neo was delivered quickly. Overall I think a decent unit. I like the one touch 30 second startup. The chime at the end is a bit much but it quits after three times to tell you your item has been heated. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well, seamless and great looking. Functions well, the only negative is to use the timer function you have to open the door. But overall that is a small price.

customer_reviews.text: Well- I had to get my rocket science degree hat on- However, after a few try’s and errors, I finished it out.

I don’t seen any difference in cooking or power due to the inverter than any of my past cheaper microwaves. I was hoping that paying $25-35 dollars more for an inverter would improve the power or reduce cooking time, well that didn’t happen. Has fancy look & controls .

customer_reviews.title: LG Microwave is a winner!

It has a nice exterior blackout screen, very very easy to use. The interior glass plate and side walls wipe down with ease. So far, i am very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Friend

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this microwave. I purchased it because it was one of the Consumer Reports recommended appliances. Also easy for my elderly mother in law to use, despite the fact that there aren't any numbers.

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious microwave with modern appearance. Easy to open/close. Easy to wipe down and clean due to seamless appearance.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Powerful compact microwave
customer_reviews.text: My number one constraint was ringing a microwave that could fit in my cabinet opening. This compact microwave is far more powerful than the unit it replaced. It’s easy to use and well designed.

customer_reviews.title: Happiest Microwave I’ve Ever Met
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is just what we were looking for. The touch feature is awesome for a quick adjustment to the cook time. I am thrilled about the fact that it sings a happy little tune instead of beeping at me!! It is simple and silly, but an awesome bonus feature!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmu Dunn

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! It is very dangerous. It sparks and smells like smoke...even seen flames come out. It’s happened several times. I’ve read at least 10 other reviewers say the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Love the compact size
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my counter. Like the chimes. wish it toasts as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Started arching right after warranty ended. Sigh.
customer_reviews.text: Was great until.... Literally in 13th Month of use... Started arching for no reason. Same plates we've always used. On hold with LG customer service now... Who are saying that they can't find my warranty registration because "I did it through the computer and that's a different system". What??? Wth kind of company is this? Disappointed. I'll update if they do the right thing. Right now am skeptical. (I did not purchase through Amazon btw but I thought important to share a review)

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a year and 9 months, door in front of operating panel is awkward and space-wasting
customer_reviews.text: This unit started to spark on the cover of the magnetron after less than two years of operation. It was clean. The door that covers the operating panel is awkward, you need to open the door to push buttons, and because it makes the door three inches wider, and needs a larger space to swing in, it uses space on your counter that another unit would not. Purchased on Amazon from another vendor.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Muffler for
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the most annoying appliance I have ever owned. It plays a tune when the time is up and keep repeating it until you open the door. It needs a muffler or an owner that is hard of hearing. Per

customer_reviews.title: Refund for defective unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 12/24/2018. Stop heating food 1/9/2019. Very unhappy. Best buy would not refund so had to contact lg...fax receipt and wait for refund letter....not a great experience
customer_reviews.author: Nancy mitchell

customer_reviews.title: A mix of good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Pros: ---- Easy to set it to 30 seconds. Or a minute. Or 90 seconds. Or 40, 50, 70, seconds. Cons: ---- Easy to set for some short times: But after that, it gets more annoying. No number pad. Finicky controls to set anything other than 'add 30 seconds' 'add ten seconds' 'subtract ten seconds'. So, if all you do is reheat coffee, you're fine. Want it to be at 4 minutes? You either have to press the 30 button eight times. Or fight with the slider. Common buttons hidden inside door. Have to refer to charts also inside door to decipher.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dreifort

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: My former Daewoo MIcrowave lasted about 15 years. I bought this microwave August 2, 2019 and it gets very light use. Now, roughly a year later it has begun to malfunction. Sparks fly, an exploding noise occurs and smoke emanates from the unit any time we try to use it. It's actually quite scary. Unacceptable that this unit lasts a year! Horrible quality and I would never buy another LG product because of this. Furthermore, it's quite a pain to use the control panel.
customer_reviews.author: voracious reader

customer_reviews.title: AVOID- Died within a year of purchase TWICE
customer_reviews.text: So my ex and I got one from Target, it broke. I liked it enough I wanted another one, and then THAT one also broke about a week ago. The 10 year warranty is useless as they wouldn't accept an electronic receipt which is all Target gave the ex. I wouldn't recommend buying one of these to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Thaws unevenly at turntable level
customer_reviews.text: It thaws blueberries unevenly on a plate set directly down on the turntable. If I set the plate higher up on a cup it thaws them evenly. It also doesn't show the power level you've set it at while it's running. Neither had been a problem with my old Panasonic. Otherwise it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: Free Trip
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice features, nice design, clean minimalist look. Easy to clean, even heating. Well crafted. Cons: Comes with a free trip to the the landfill in less than a year. (transportation and fees not included)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year (smoke started pouring out of the internal electronics).
customer_reviews.text: I loved this microwave. Size was perfect. Worked well. This morning (less than a year after purchase), it started buzzing loudly and smoke started pouring out if it (even when run empty). LG does not make it easy to get service.
customer_reviews.author: A. Holub

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: 3 months old cook timer wouldn't work properly Caught on fire
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Can not reommend
customer_reviews.text: After 17 months the power levels would not return to 100% when I used the auto settings or lowered the power levels. Had to unplug the unit to get it to reset. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Imperial Force

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, our machine stopped working after a year. Overheated and had an electric fire smell. Blew out the circuits in the plug.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Repeatedly locks up.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is now only two years old but repeated locks up with a f-3 error message. Then I need to shut off the circuit breaker box to restart it. A royal pain.
customer_reviews.author: L. Clough

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME microwave!
customer_reviews.text: No cons. Paid more for this one than others for its compact size and haven’t been disappointed. Great signal tones too.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Less than 2 year and it was over....
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking model, but the relationship lasted less than two years. Other reviewers had tried to warn me, but I wouldn't listen. Sound of sarcastic arcing deep inside and the smell of electronic mockery told me that our relationship was over. My previous Sharp Carousel never let me down. Maybe it's time to spark up the old relationship.
customer_reviews.author: JKepp

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 in 1.5 years. First one stopped heating and was replaced under warranty after getting the run around from LG. Now the replacement has done the exact same thing. LG will reimburse, if I buy another one, but I'm looking at getting another brand. I can't recommend this product. As a matter of fact, I would just stay away.
customer_reviews.author: KDEE

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and works great, annoying sound
customer_reviews.text: Heats food very fast, very attractive, affordable price. Only downside is the horribly annoying song it plays, and there’s no numbers on it. For this price it’s fine.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Died after 7 months. Just let out a beep and died in the middle of heating up dinner. Stay away from LG.
